entry.title: üìëPPK and PEM on AWS
entry.summary: .pem file is what you have download from AWS when you created your key-pair. This is only a one time download and you cannot download it again. Your software is asking for .pem file. Now you are the one who needs to locate that file. You might have downloaded it on you laptop/desktop...etc. As I said above, .pem is not saved anywhere on EC2. It is a one time download and you have to keep ...
